title: Shout of Terror
description: Deals damage to enemies around the caster and dampens their armor. Enemies hit have a chance of being stunned

title: Frost Wave
description: Emits Cold energy in front of the caster to deal damage to enemies

title: Shield Charge
description: Charges forward to inflict Physical DMG on the enemy

title: Combo
description: Swings weapon to attack the enemy twice. Deals DMG even faster from Frenzy effect on hit

title: Illusion Axe
description: Summons Illusion Axes that circle around the caster to deal damage to the enemy

title: Lightning Strike
description: Calls down lightning in front and around the lightning to deal damage to enemies.

title: Explosive Slash
description: Applies Debuff effect on hit. Killing a Debuffed enemy causes an explosion that deals damage to nearby enemies

title: Earth Blow
description: Strikes the ground to deal DMG to the enemy Gain Maintain Position Effect on hit, effect decays upon moving

title: Leap Attack
description: Leaps forward to inflict damage and knock enemies back upon landing

title: Whirlwind
description: Spins toward the control direction while Channeling, dealing damage to all enemies in the path

title: Crescent Slash
description: Swings weapon in a wide area to deal Physical DMG to multiple enemies

title: Lightning Vortex
description: Swings weapon to damage multiple enemies and create a vortex. The vortex deals additional damage to nearby enemies

title: Illusion Hook
description: Throws a hook to inflict Physical DMG on the enemy. Enemies hit will be pulled toward the caster

title: Shield Strike
description: Knocks the enemy back with a shield to inflict Physical DMG

title: Quick Slash
description: Inflicts additional damage to nearby enemies upon hitting a single enemy

title: Fissure
description: Slams the ground to create a fissure that deals damage to enemies in a wide area, with a chance to gain Earth Energy on a normal hit

title: Whirlwind Slash
description: Slashes the air quickly to send forth a Whirlwind

title: Bloodshed
description: Chance to afflict Bleed to targets hit and creates a Domain of Blood upon inflicting Bleed

title: Frost Strike
description: Strikes the ground to create a Frost Pillar that deals damage to enemies

title: Fighter's Wrath
description: Amplifies Melee DMG and increases Attack Speed during skill duration

title: Bulwark of Protection
description: Increases Armor and Element Resist during skill duration

title: Shout of Provocation
description: Increases the caster's Armor during skill duration and forces enemies within range to attack the caster. Temporarily increases DMG upon use

title: Blood Explosion
description: Cause Blood Explosion in the surrounding area upon reaching stack count by inflicting Bleed

title: Guardian
description: Deals Physical DMG to nearby enemies and inflicts Stun or Slow on hit

title: Enduring Pain
description: Increases Armor based on stacks upon taking damage while using this skill. Gains an Enhance buff at Max Stacks

title: Electric Area
description: Creates an Electric Area that deals Lightning damage in the forward direction. Enemies within range take Lightning damage periodically

title: Wheel Slash
description: Slash the surroundings to deal DoT to the target.

title: Sprint
description: Sprint very quickly for a short amount of time. Becomes momentarily immune to Crowd Control status effects.

title: Thorn Explosion
description: Attack by summoning thorns around the target and additionally triggers an explosion attack

title: The Absolute's Hammer
description: Throws a hammer that spirals in vortex and deals DMG to nearby enemies.

title: Tenacious Regeneration
description: Increases HP and HP Regen during skill duration

title: Seal of Condensed Destruction
description: Increases Target's Physical DMG

title: Seal of Defense
description: Increases Target's Armor

title: Seal of Crowd Control Dodge
description: Increases Crowd Control Dodge Chance of target.

title: Fire Blow
description: Slams the ground to deal Fire DMG and create a Fire Pillar.

title: Domain of Strength
description: Channels to summon a Domain of Strength. Domain of Strength automatically attacks enemies on each attack cycle. Attacks grow faster with longer channeling

title: Shout of Justice
description: Dampens enemy Movement Speed within range, temporarily Recovers HP, and removes Status Effects during Skill duration

title: Fierce Strike
description: Summons a hammer to deal Physical damage to multiple enemies. Periodically summons a giant hammer to deal even more damage instead

title: Fire Storm
description: Spin in place to create a Fire Storm, and create a new Fire Storm upon hitting a Burning enemy

title: Seal of Physical Domain
description: Decreases Target's Physical DMG Taken

title: Seal of Striking
description: Amplifies Target's Strike DMG

title: Arctic Shard
description: Creates Ice Pillars to deal Cold DMG against enemies, and creates additional Ice Pillars based on Cold Energy

title: Spread Shot
description: Fires several arrows over a wide area to inflict physical damage on the enemy

title: Explosive Arrow
description: Fires an exploding arrow to deal damage to the enemy. Killing an enemy with an attached arrow inflicts additional explosion damage

title: Icy Arrow
description: Fires an icy arrow to damage the enemy. Frost Spheres are formed along the arrow's path inflicting additional damage with an explosion

title: Rapid Shot
description: Fires multiple arrows in a straight line to inflict physical damage on the enemy

title: Poison Cloud
description: Forms a poisonous cloud around the caster to deal Poison DMG to enemies

title: Piercing Arrow
description: Fires an arrow that pierces targets to inflict damage

title: Rain of Arrows
description: Temporarily calls down a Rain of Arrows to deal DMG to enemies. Rain of Arrows duration is affected by Attack Speed

title: Burn Arrow
description: Shoots a Fire arrow that causes Burn and inflicts damage on the enemy

title: Cross Lightning Arrow
description: Fires an arrow that explodes in a cross shape to inflict damage on the enemy

title: Dagger Throw
description: Throws a dagger to damage the enemy. Inflicts additional damage by bouncing off surrounding enemies on hit

title: Roll
description: Rolls a short distance forward

title: Cross Slash
description: Cross your weapons to deal damage twice to enemies in front of you

title: Spinning Dagger
description: Throws a spinning dagger at enemies in a straight line to inflict damage

title: Illusion Strike
description: Moves forward to inflict damage on enemies. Chance to inflict Status Effects on Strikes and Critical Hits

title: Piercing Sentry
description: Piercing Sentry has the Strike, Physical, Projectile tags.

title: Fan Blade Sentry
description: Fan Blade Sentry has the Strike, Physical, Projectile tags.

title: Electric Sentry
description: Electric Sentry has the Strike, Lightning, Projectile tags.

title: Deadly Poison Claw
description: Swings a Dagger to deal Area DMG. Has a chance to gain Poison Energy upon dealing DMG to enemies, and amplifies DMG per stack.

title: Shadow Forest
description: Creates an artificial space that deals DoT to enemies

title: Blade of Death
description: Throws a dagger that returns to the caster

title: Bombardment Arrow
description: Fires an arrow that bombards a large area

title: Deadly Poison Skewer
description: Stabs forward while charging. Consumes Poison Energy to deal DMG and applies DMG Amplification and Critical DMG per stack.

title: Unleash Lightning Shot
description: Shoots an arrow that inflicts Shock. Discharges multiple Lightning strands upon hitting a Shocked enemy

title: Frost Sentry
description: Frost Sentry has the Strike, Area of Effect, Cold, Projectile tags.

title: Vital Strike
description: Increases Critical Rate and Critical DMG during skill duration

title: Marksman
description: Increases Projectile DMG and Pierce Count during skill duration

title: Illusion Arrow
description: Chance to automatically fire a Guided Arrow upon reaching stack count with Bow Skills

title: Poison Explosion
description: Cause Poison Explosion in the surrounding area upon reaching stack count by inflicting Venom

title: Counterattack
description: Deal DMG to the enemy upon dodging, blocking, or damaged by enemy attack

title: Improved Senses
description: Gains a temporary Enhance effect based on the number of Daggers equipped upon using a Skill

title: Enchanted Sentry
description: Amplifies the Attack Speed of nearby Sentries based on the number of stacks while Channeling

title: Freeze Arrow
description: Fires multiple arrows that freeze the enemy to deal damage and cause an additional Cold Explosion upon inflicting Freeze

title: Scorching Arrow
description: Fires a burning arrow. Gains Maintain Position effect on hit and fires an additional arrow based on the number of stacks

title: Lightning Arrow
description: Fires arrows in a row and deals Lightning Damage to enemy. Obtain Lightning Energy at a certain chance on hit and gain effect proportionate to Lightning Energy stack.

title: Shockwave Trap
description: Installs a Trap that explodes to deal Physical DMG upon detecting an enemy

title: Fire Fissure Trap
description: Installs a Trap that explodes to deal Fire DMG upon detecting an enemy

title: Frost Trap
description: Installs a Trap that detonates a cold orb to deal Cold DMG upon detecting an enemy

title: Electric Orb Trap
description: Installs a Trap that fires an electric orb that deals Lightning DMG upon detecting an enemy

title: Poison Gas Trap
description: Installs a Trap that generates poison gas that deals Poison DMG upon detecting an enemy

title: Activate Trap
description: Forces all installed Traps to activate.

title: Electric Shell Shot
description: Shoots an Electric Round that explodes behind the target on Hit

title: Aerial Throw
description: Move and deal DMG within trail

title: Total Barrage
description: Accumulate up to max Overheat when used to deal DMG proportionate to the remaining Overheat

title: Instant Acceleration
description: Move fast and Release Accumulated Overheat

title: Whirlwind Barrage
description: Shoots a barrage of rounds around you while moving when maintaining Focus

title: Ogre Arrow
description: Fires a projectile that pierces and tracks the enemy

title: Shockwave Sentry
description: Shockwave Sentry has the Strike, Physical, Projectile tags.

title: Penetrating Slash
description: Moves forward, inflicting Physical damage on enemies in your path

title: Poison Rain of Arrows
description: Fires an arrow into the air to inflict damage on the enemy

title: Attack Impulse
description: Temporarily increases Attack Speed and DMG upon use

title: Seal of Accuracy
description: Increases Target's Hit Rate

title: Seal of Dodge
description: Increases Target's Dodge Rate

title: Seal of Critical Chance
description: Increases Target's Critical Chance

title: Sentry Expert
description: Changes Sentry Stats according to the situation

title: Fire Orb Trap
description: Installs a Trap that fires a randomly exploding flame orb that deals Fire DMG upon detecting an enemy

title: Chill Area Trap
description: Installs a Trap that generates a chilly area that deals Cold DMG upon detecting an enemy

title: Wind Blade
description: Deal Physical DMG by scattering daggers nearby. Deal DMG again on Critical Hit.

title: Throw Explosive
description: Throw numerous explosives to deal DMG within an area

title: Firebomb Shot
description: Shoots a Fire Element shell A Firebomb explodes on Hit and deals DMG for a set amount of time

title: Trick Shot
description: Moves forward and deals damage to an enemy behind

title: Shockwave Arrow
description: Fires an arrow that pierces through a short distance to deal damage to enemies

title: Veil of Protection
description: Decreases Melee or Projectile DMG Taken whenever a Skill is used

title: Seal of Chaos Resist
description: Increases Target's Chaos Resist

title: Ice Crystal Arrow
description: Shoots a Cold Arrow that can be Chained. Gain Scaling Cold effect on hit and fires additional arrow(s) upon moving based on the number of Cold Crystal stack(s)

title: Summon Abyssling
description: Abyssling has the Strike, Area of Effect, Physical, Melee tags.

title: Gather Minions
description: Summons all Minions to the caster's location

title: Fire Ball
description: Fires a fire ball that explodes on hit to deal fire damage

title: Frost Ball
description: Fires a slow-moving Frost Sphere that pierces enemies in its path to deal cold damage

title: Frost Shock
description: Forms an area of Ice Thorns around the caster to deal Cold DMG to enemies

title: Poison Orb
description: Throws a poison orb that bounces forward and deals Poison DMG to enemies

title: Lightning Typhoon
description: Temporarily summons a Lightning Typhoon that follows enemies to deal Lighting DMG

title: Frost Thorn
description: Shoots out Frost Thorns to deal Cold DMG to the enemy

title: Flamethrower
description: Deals Fire DMG, amplifying Fire DMG for each Channeling stage. Canceling Channeling at stage 1 or above causes Fire Explosion. However, Fire Explosion is not caused when Channeling is canceled by Movement Skills or Crowd Control effects

title: Charge Release
description: Fires several electric currents to deal Lightning DMG on the enemy

title: Toxic Flame
description: Fires a piercing toxic flame that deals Poison DoT. Is not affected by Projectile DMG

title: Summon Javelin Abyssling
description: Javelin Abyssling has the Strike, Physical, Projectile tags.

title: Unite Crowd (Enrage)
description: Changes your Minion's active stance every time this skill is used.

title: Summon Bursting Rune Knight
description: Bursting Rune Knight has the Strike, Area of Effect, Fire, Melee tags.

title: Sacred Devotion
description: Decreases the caster's Armor and all Element Resist while channeling, but increases Minion DMG

title: Cold Armor
description: Forms an ice barrier that inflicts Cold DMG and causes Chill to attackers when hit by a melee attack

title: Lightning Chain
description: Discharges lightning that chains to deal lightning damage to multiple enemies

title: Meteor
description: Brings down a massive meteor to deal damage on enemies in an area

title: Poison Area
description: Temporarily forms a poisonous area to deal Poison DMG to enemies

title: Plague Spike
description: Fires plague spikes to deal Poison DMG to the enemy. Triggers Burst Plague on hit, inflicting a plague that decreases the enemy's Element Resist by chance.

title: Frost Bomb
description: Fires a Frost Bomb that explodes after a period of time. Upon explosion, shoots several Ice Shards to deal Cold DMG on the enemy

title: Thunderbolt
description: Calls down lightning in front and around the caster to deal damage to enemies

title: Summon Fire Orb Abyssling
description: Fire Orb Abyssling has the Strike, Range, Area of Effect, Fire, Projectile tags.

title: Summon Poison Arrow Abyssling
description: Poison Arrow Abyssling has the Strike, Poison, Projectile tags.

title: Summon Lightning Arrow Abyssling
description: Lightning Arrow Abyssling has the Strike, Lightning, Projectile tags.

title: Summon Snow Orb Abyssling
description: Snow Orb Abyssling has the Strike, Cold, Projectile tags.

title: Mark of Focus
description: Marks an enemy for a period of time. The marked enemy becomes the target of minion attacks and receives increased damage from Minions

title: Siphon Life
description: Grants enemy HP Absorb effect to yourself and your Minion during skill duration

title: Summon Arctic Rune Knight
description: Arctic Rune Knight has the Strike, Area of Effect, Cold, Melee tags.

title: Summon Lightning Rune Knight
description: Lightning Rune Knight has the Strike, Area of Effect, Lightning, Melee tags.

title: Release Element
description: Amplifies Element DMG and increases Cast Speed during skill duration

title: Intensify Pain
description: Increases DMG Status Effect Rate for the duration, and Status Effect DMG are amplified

title: Cold Outburst
description: Launches multiple Ice Spikes forward. Deals damage beyond the target with Ice Shards

title: Weaken Totem
description: Summons a Totem that increases DMG Taken by enemies

title: Tremor Totem
description: Summons a Totem that dampens Movement, Attack, and Cast Speed of enemies

title: Protection Totem
description: Summons a Totem that increases Barrier and decreases Barrier Regen Cycle for Caster and allies

title: Life Totem
description: Summons a Totem that increases HP Regen for Caster and allies

title: Mist Totem
description: Summons a Totem that decreases Hit Rate and Critical Rate of enemies

title: Electromagnetic Field
description: Releases an Electric Sphere that instantly draws enemies to the center

title: Teleport
description: Teleports forward. Temporarily increases Element Resist after teleporting

title: Summon Deadly Poison Rune Knight
description: Deadly Poison Rune Knight has the Strike, Area of Effect, Poison, Melee tags.

title: Agile Movement
description: Gains a buff that temporarily dampens DMG Taken and amplifies Dodge Rate upon taking DMG while maintaining Skill

title: Pantheon
description: Enhances your Barrier to greatly increase Barrier Regen

title: Dark Judgment
description: Summons Judgment at random to your surrounding and deals damage with your highest element Buff will reset on using any skills other than Judgment

title: Persistent Strike
description: Increases the chance of double maximization for the duration

title: Hazy Melody (Low Tone, High Tone)
description: The stance applied to minions are changed whenever a skill is used.

title: Condense Fire
description: Creates a sphere of condensed Fire Energy

title: Fire Torrent
description: Channels to temporarily summon a Fire Torrent. Flames periodically spew out from the torrent to track down enemies. Attacks grow faster with longer channeling

title: Electric Ball
description: Fires an electric ball that periodically explodes. Explosions deal Lightning DMG to nearby enemies

title: Sacred Light
description: Deal DMG with the highest Elemental damage in front while Channeling. Gain Maintain Position Effect on hit, effect decays upon moving.

title: Summon Wrathful Rune Knight
description: Wrathful Rune Knight has the Strike, Area of Effect, Physical, Melee tags.

title: Weaken DMG Totem
description: Summons a Totem that Dampens enemy DMG

title: Seal of Condensed Elements
description: Increases Target's Element DMG

title: Seal of Element Resist
description: Increases Target's Element Resist for all Elements

title: Summon Twisted Abyssling
description: Twisted Abyssling has the Strike, Area of Effect, Physical, Melee tags.

title: Judgment of Light
description: Deal DMG with Highest Element. Amplify DMG and increase Resource Cost on hit. Buff will reset on using any skills other than Judgment.

title: Absorb Energy
description: Consumes all Energy to increase stats identical to the effect(s) of consumed Energy for the duration

title: Lightning Wave
description: Use all Lightning Energy to fire a lightning wave to deal Lightning Damage to frontal enemies.

title: Flames of Death
description: Burst out a trail of fire that deals Fire DMG, deal omni directional Fire DMG upon reaching max Fire Energy

title: Seal of Persistence
description: Increase Double Maximized DMG effect of Target

title: Wings of Ignition
description: Summons projectiles that track enemies, and if hit, the projectiles split. The split projectiles then track new targets.

title: Black Plague
description: Moves toward the control direction while channeling, forming an area of Black Plague around yourself. Inflicts additional DMG according to the number of Black Plague stacks. However, Great Plague is not caused when Channeling is canceled by Movement Skills or Crowd Control effects.

title: Blizzard
description: Summons a powerful Blizzard that deals DMG to enemies in front of the caster. Blizzard duration is affected by Cast Speed

title: Wind Totem
description: Summons a Totem that increases Attack Speed and Cast Speed for Caster and allies

title: Seal of Elemental Domain
description: Decreases Target's Element DMG Taken

title: Seal of Pain
description: Amplifies Target's DoT

title: Vision Shift
description: Moves forward to inflict DMG on enemies. Amplifies Resource Cost and DMG upon continuously using the skill.
